http://www.iforgeiron.com/

http://www.anvilfire.com/gurusden/index.htm
Artist-Blacksmith's Association of North America
http://www.abana.org/
Lucian Avery -Excellent videos of basic techniques
http://www.lucianaveryblacksmith.com/smithing.htm
Chileforge  -Propane forges
http://www.chileforge.com/
David Robertson -Blacksmithing demos
http://artistblacksmith.com/
Also look for his videos on Youtube.
Front Step Forge - Shawn Cunningham, Edmonton area blacksmith and instructor
http://www.frontstepforge.com/
Northern Alberta Institute of Technology - Continuing Education
Under Trades and Technology, select "All Courses" and the enter "blacksmith" in the search box.  It will list recent and future courses or try the following link:
http://www.nait.ca/program_home_81499.htm
Leduc West  Antique Society - The location of our shop
http://www.leducwestantique.ca/
Dodds Coal Mine - Thermal coal supplier in Ryley, Alberta
http://www.doddscoalmine.com/
Western Canadian Blacksmiths' Guild - Founding Chapter in the Edmonton / Leduc area
http://www.albertablacksmiths.ca/
